query: SELECT COLUMN_NAME, COLUMN_TYPE, IS_NULLABLE FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'contracts' AND TABLE_SCHEMA = DATABASE();
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user KrGaEuKwKPW5NAp.root --database mP6FLm6cHUyVdEMNViNuZS --execute SELECT COLUMN_NAME, COLUMN_TYPE, IS_NULLABLE FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'contracts' AND TABLE_SCHEMA = DATABASE();
stdout:
COLUMN_NAME	COLUMN_TYPE	IS_NULLABLE
id	int(11)	NO
bookingId	int(11)	YES
artistId	int(11)	YES
venueId	int(11)	YES
contractType	varchar(50)	NO
contractTitle	varchar(255)	NO
contractContent	text	NO
contractPdfUrl	text	YES
status	enum('draft','pending_signatures','signed','executed','cancelled')	NO
artistSignedAt	timestamp	YES
venueSignedAt	timestamp	YES
createdAt	timestamp	NO
updatedAt	timestamp	NO
